1)Is it me or does using Heartburst attack against slimes do more 
harm than good?  I heartburst them, and then they grow.

2)Is there any way in heck to kill a large/medium slime with one blow? 
  No matter how powerfull your attack is, the best you can do is make 
them shrink one size down.  I swear that if anyone could master slime 
and use one as an entire team, the team would be unbeatable because 
you could always run your opponents out of magic.

3)Slime have this knack for getting shrank one size and a second later 
growing back to theat original slime.  A single bomb can't do enough 
damage to a slime, but 15 or so overlapping bombs can.

4)What's with Slime and Poison Clouds?  Slime can be held in place by 
an anchored Poison Cloud, but every other character can walk right 
throw it.

Slime are most vulernable in tight spaces where you can anchor Poison 
Clouds and are most dangerous in a completely open field.

BTW, I should be through with creating another scenario soon, leaving 
me with 7 to complete my set of 50.  I don't want to think about the 
design for the next scenario.
